message.fungal_harvest: The air smells earthy and damp... Mushrooms thrive in the dark today.
message.temporal_flux: The ticking of time warps and stutters. The mines feel unstuck from normal time.
message.berserker_day: You sense bloodlust echoing through the caverns. Monsters grow furious once wounded.
message.frenzy_fog: A pale fog seeps through the tunnels. Shapes rush at you from the mist.
message.bloodthirst_winds: Warm, metallic winds blow through the depths. The mines themselves seem hungry.
message.unstable_veins: The rock hums with unstable energy... The veins feel ready to burst.
message.lucky_veins: The stone feels soft... like it wants to open.
buff.daybuff.name: Cave Weather
config.section.main.tooltip: Global settings for how often cave weather happens.
config.dailyChance.name: Chance per day (%)
config.dailyChance.tooltip: Percent chance that a cave weather will occur each day.
config.section.weathers.tooltip: Enable/disable each weather and choose where it can occur.
config.section.tuning.tooltip: Adjust the strength of each weather’s effects.
config.weather.fungal.title: Fungal Harvest
config.weather.fungal.tooltip: More mushrooms appear; slimes sometimes drop mushrooms; ambient spores float in the air.
config.weather.fungal.enabled.name: Enabled
config.weather.fungal.enabled.tooltip: Allow Fungal Harvest to be chosen on some days.
config.weather.temporal.title: Temporal Flux
config.weather.temporal.tooltip: Time slows in the mines; monsters move in fast bursts and slowdowns.
config.weather.temporal.enabled.name: Enabled
config.weather.temporal.enabled.tooltip: Allow Temporal Flux to be chosen on some days.
config.weather.berserker.title: Berserker Day
config.weather.berserker.tooltip: Monsters become faster and more aggressive after being hit once. You gain defense to compensate.
config.weather.berserker.enabled.name: Enabled
config.weather.berserker.enabled.tooltip: Allow Berserker Day to be chosen on some days.
config.weather.frenzy.title: Frenzy Fog
config.weather.frenzy.tooltip: A weak fog settles in; monsters are slightly faster; you gain defense to compensate.
config.weather.frenzy.enabled.name: Enabled
config.weather.frenzy.enabled.tooltip: Allow Frenzy Fog to be chosen on some days.
config.weather.bloodthirst.title: Bloodthirst Winds
config.weather.bloodthirst.tooltip: Monsters slowly heal over time; you suffer a defense penalty; red dust swirls occasionally.
config.weather.bloodthirst.enabled.name: Enabled
config.weather.bloodthirst.enabled.toolt: Allow Bloodthirst Winds to be chosen on some days.
config.weather.unstable.title: Unstable Veins
config.weather.unstable.tooltip: Volatile veins burst with minor explosions and knockback, but reward you with extra ore.
config.weather.unstable.enabled.name: Enabled
config.weather.unstable.enabled.tooltip: Allow Unstable Veins to be chosen on some days.
config.weather.lucky.title: Lucky Veins
config.weather.lucky.tooltip: The stone feels soft—extra ore finds, a small coal bonus, and occasional glints.
config.weather.lucky.enabled.name: Enabled
config.weather.lucky.enabled.tooltip: Allow Lucky Veins to be chosen on some days.
config.fungal.extraMushrooms.name: Fungal: extra mushrooms per floor
config.fungal.extraMushrooms.tooltip: How many mushrooms spawn near you when entering a floor during Fungal Harvest.
config.fungal.slimeDropChance.name: Fungal: slime drop chance (%)
config.fungal.slimeDropChance.tooltip: Chance per second that each slime produces a mushroom during Fungal Harvest.
config.temporal.timeScale.name: Temporal: time speed (%)
config.temporal.timeScale.tooltip: Time speed inside the mines on Temporal Flux days. 70% means time passes slower.
config.berserker.speedBonus.name: Berserker: monster speed bonus
config.berserker.speedBonus.tooltip: Speed added to monsters after they are hit once.
config.berserker.aggroBonus.name: Berserker: monster aggro bonus (tiles)
config.berserker.aggroBonus.tooltip: Extra tiles of detection range after monsters become enraged.
config.berserker.playerDefense.name: Berserker: player defense
config.berserker.playerDefense.tooltip: Defense adjustment while in mines on Berserker Day.
config.frenzy.monsterSpeed.name: Frenzy: monster speed bonus
config.frenzy.monsterSpeed.tooltip: Flat speed bonus applied to monsters on Frenzy Fog days.
config.frenzy.playerDefense.name: Frenzy: player defense
config.frenzy.playerDefense.tooltip: Defense adjustment while in mines on Frenzy Fog days.
config.frenzy.fogOpacity.name: Frenzy: fog opacity
config.frenzy.fogOpacity.tooltip: Fog overlay opacity (0 = invisible, 255 = fully opaque).
config.bloodthirst.defPenalty.name: Bloodthirst: defense penalty
config.bloodthirst.defPenalty.tooltip: How much Defense is reduced while in mines on Bloodthirst Winds days.
config.bloodthirst.healInterval.name: Bloodthirst: heal interval (ticks)
config.bloodthirst.healInterval.tooltip: How often monsters heal. 60 ticks ≈ 1 second.
config.bloodthirst.healAmount.name: Bloodthirst: heal amount
config.bloodthirst.healAmount.tooltip: How much HP monsters heal each interval.
config.unstable.pulseChance.name: Unstable: burst chance per pulse (%)
config.unstable.pulseChance.tooltip: Chance that unstable veins trigger a burst each pulse.
config.unstable.damage.name: Unstable: burst damage
config.unstable.damage.tooltip: Damage dealt by bursts (minor and not intended to be lethal).
config.unstable.minOre.name: Unstable: min extra ore drops
config.unstable.minOre.tooltip: Minimum extra ore dropped when a burst happens.
config.unstable.maxOre.name: Unstable: max extra ore drops
config.unstable.maxOre.tooltip: Maximum extra ore dropped when a burst happens.
config.lucky.extraOreFinds.name: Lucky: extra ore finds per floor
config.lucky.extraOreFinds.tooltip: Extra ore spawned near you when you enter a floor on Lucky Veins days.
config.lucky.coalChance.name: Lucky: coal find chance per pulse (%)
config.lucky.coalChance.tooltip: Chance to find a piece of coal during Lucky Veins pulses.
